title: Karlach
tags: where to find karlach in bg3
how to romance karlach in bg3
content:
Jaheira with truth herb. Approves of shuffling the lanceboard in favor of Mol. Play the lute for Art Cullagh to wake him up (Malus Thorn in the House of Healing has the lute) Protect the portal while Halsin saves Thaniel

Ruined Battlefield

Release Dolly Dolly Dolly from the Moonlantern Play hide and seek with Oliver Play another round of hide and seek with Oliver

Reithwin Masons' Guild

Tell Arabella that you'll find her parents

House of Healing

Convince the sisters to practice on themselv
